      Returns:

    • handleProxyData

      private boolean handleProxyData() throws IOException
      Handles proxying email data to another SMTP server.

      Streams the received email to the proxy connection after storage processors accept it.

      Connection remains open for reuse with subsequent envelopes.

      Returns:
      Boolean indicating success.
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to communicate.
